refreshInterval.title: Device Status Refresh Interval (seconds)
refreshInterval.description: How often to poll MELCloud API for device status updates. Temperature changes slowly, so 5 minutes (300s) is typically sufficient. Note: Changes made via HomeKit update instantly (within 2 seconds).
